replies.body: I don't see it in the client. How do I get in?
Up now! Under 'Training' -- Thanks Riot!
Try re logging, if it doesn't work maybe they announced it before actual turn on
You play on the old client? (it's the only thing that could come to mind other than trying to restart your game)
Same issue. I have the new client too.
I just wish you could do it with another person. Would really help with those two man combos.

Are you guys gonna make it so you can add friends in the practice mode in the future or just leave it as a single player mode? I really want to teach my non-level 30 friends how to play certain champs and tricks  because it's boring to wait 5 mins for flash and a couple mins for ult when you teach them in custom mode.

They are taking a different approach development-wise with the practice tool. They are releasing the tool with a minimal set of features and they will add as they go, whereas they usually just wait until all the features are in place.

For the moment it is single player only, and will be for a while, but we dont know what features will be next, only that they are taking suggestions
I think 1v1 custom games work just fine if you have an actual person to play with. If you don't, the practice tool is ideal.
I don't see it where would it be?????
click on "Tutorial", It should be in there.
I feel like we bots shouldn't be promoting how to use this system...
Are you go to put it in the Old Clients Because some people does not have the new client. So if you put it in the old one People that does not have the new clients go to be happy :D
Anyone can upgrade to the new client now. Riot has said they won't be adding new features to the old client (like Replays, for instance). New features will only get added to the new client.

Also, they've been including parts of the new client download in patches for old client users, so it won't be a terribly long wait, and there's the recently improved low-spec mode if you're worried about performance issues.

You can't upgrade to the new client anymore. I had the new client and uninstalled for a month or two to work on applications. When I re-downloaded the game, I had the old client and haven't been able to upgrade since.
You can download it from the old client launcher. Did it like 10 days ago for a friend.
So What About Those Still Using The Old Client?

IIRC, they're going to push people more to the new client in the next couple of months.  They've been including bits of the new client with the past few patches to make the final download smaller, and eventually the old client will no longer be supported.
**USE THE NEW ONE**{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

My computer lags when I use it and multiple times it has stopped responding when I'm in the lobby or whatever it's called so I get a time ban thing. I really just need to buy a new computer but I'm poor af.
 {{item:3070}}
just set it to low spec mode under settings. i had the same problem but now the new client is useable

*logs in* 

o boy time to practice against some characters 

>ahri is not a bot you can train against

thanks riot
I don't believe you can play against Ahri in Co-op vs AI either. Only some champions are programmed to be bots.
you should put it on the old client to, my computer screen is really small and i have to use the old one any chance?
I think they let you modify the resolution of the new client in the settings. Haven't checked, just what I remember.
The old client is going away pretty soon (I think they said in 2-3 patches or so)... if you're not able to use the new client that's going to be a problem very soon.
How small? You can make the new client pretty small, just press Ctrl Down.
To those having trouble, it is under the "training" tab after pressing play, it is not in the "create custom" tab.
Don't see it
New client, under "Training". Should be there.
if it is out how do u get to it
New client, under "Training". Should be there.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} can't find it
New client, under "Training". Should be there.
I updated to the new client, but now every time I launch it tells me an error and that I need to reinstall?
Seeing this in school made the day less tedious :D
Can't wait to get home from work to check this our.

Hi! Just out of my own curiosity, is there plan for this to include a group of people?

I was thinking a bot lane duo trying out some combos, be it the Ballista{{champion:53}} {{champion:429}} or the nami cait trap timing etc

Thanks!
I thought there would be a leash emulator. Am I missing something? Am I suppose to use the Target Dummies for leash simulation?
If anything this is better, you can't always rely on a leash- and hell if you want to simulate it just smite at the start and give yourself infinite smite, easy sol.

Some Suggestions:

+let players place more than 3 wards at the same time

+let players spectate/record the process

+let players downgrade the level

+let the player chose what turret should become invincible or stop firing 

+apply Fast-Forward to the champion as well, if he's moving to a certain destination before you click the option

+make Back-Forward


I've tried it just once so far and I really liked it, but those things would improve it a lot imo.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Practice Tool Wishlist!!




-Adding more bots and people to practice mode
This is really good and i believe most people want this available in the practice mode, this would be a great feature so you can calculate how much damage you deal with the mastery bounty hunter, Rengar stacks ect, and so you can do full build 1v1's level 1 1v1's ect. to practice different parts of the game other than just combos,this is also good for if you do like a 2 person combo ex. Yasou ult with a second person knocking up.
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
ALTHOUGH RIOT SAID THEY WOULD NOT BE IMPLEMENTING THIS I BELIEVE THEY SHOULD CONSIDER THIS AS MANY PEOPLE WANT THIS IDEA
----------------------------------------------------------------------------



-A disable crit button
this would be great for someone like Tryndamere, it would be really great to see how a fight plays out without the crit interfering so you can calculate how much damage you deal if you end up with 0 crits in a level 1 all in ect. It would be really great so you can see what your least potential damage and your most potential damage is.








-Another great feature that would be nice to have is to be able to change mastery's and runes during the game, and have access to all runes during practice mode so we can check out maybe what works for us and then buy it for real games.













- Another great feature would be to have the ability to add a little more practice dummy's, as long as it wouldn't crash or anything. ( A great addition to this would be if we could change the armor and magic resist levels of the dummy.)

This would be great so you can freeze all the waves so you can farm things with for example Sion w, Nasus q, Veigar, ect. so you can get stacks and see how much damage you deal ect. although this probably isn't healthy for the client with all the minions being in lane, So an other alternative would be to have a stacks button where you can add/max out the cap on stacks to a champion.







That's all for now although i thought up other ideas that's all i can remember for now, i think the practice tool is great and riot really did well one this one so, THANKS RIOT! but yeah, reply to this if you have any ideas and up-vote/like this if you agree with any of my ideas, thanks again, sincearly TommyBoyFTW.





{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I haven't used the Practice Tool yet, but I think (if it doesn't already have this) it should allow you to decide a build for the bot and be able to give it gold and tell it where to go, like if you want to learn how to counter an off meta build on ezreal for example.
Wish Riot would have let it able to invight friends fun mode to play around with with friends and stuff :/{{item:3070}}
> invight
THIS IS AWSOME {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
who needs a valentines card when we have the practice tool to do "practice" since lets face it everybody is going to go flash crazy and play ali pinball most likely :3
